title: WTB: Off back Reds EPDG SOV TOLS AB CYCLE
author: Redleg25

posts.post_title: WTB: Off back Reds EPDG SOV TOLS AB CYCLE
posts.post_content:
Looking for Reds in backs other than Pied, SC, and PB. Primarily looking for Sov, Tolstoi, Epdg, American beauty, and Cycle. I have many to trade (mostly common backs) but straight purchase is fine as well. Here's a quick overview of the cards I may trade:
Elberfeld Wash PSA 1
Lundgren Chi SGC 1.5
Some SLers
Some HOFers
Tons of commons

Here's a tad more specific list of what I'm looking for:
WTB:
 EPDG - Gasper, Griffith bat, Lobert, McLean, Oakes

Also Huggins hands, Mowrey and Paskert off backs

 I have a few left to trade, but nothing amazing. Straight purchase would be great
